alert.note: Alert for Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 2:13PM EST until January 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulation up to 4 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch, mainly south of the city of Houghton. * WHERE...Northern Houghton County. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening and morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest snowfall accumulations are expected along the spine of the Keweenaw south of the city of Houghton. From the city of Houghton and northward, expect around an inch or less of snowfall and a glaze of ice.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
